name: io.github.motherduckdb/mcp-server-motherduck
description: An MCP server implementation that interacts with DuckDB and MotherDuck databases, providing SQL analytics capabilities to AI Assistants and IDEs.

prompts.name: duckdb-motherduck-initial-prompt
prompts.description: A prompt to initialize a connection to DuckDB or MotherDuck and start working with it

tools.name: query
tools.description: Execute a SQL query on the DuckDB or MotherDuck database
